title: Dragon "Scream"
body:
Why is it a global sound when Dragon is taken? Even with no vision of any of the enemy team or dragon you still hear the sound when it dies.
Seems kinda hard to "sneak" dragons if its intended.

replies.body:
i thought the screech was only audible to the enemy if there is vision of the kill?

If that isn't the case it's an issue because it gives the enemy a free and exact timer for the respawn  when they potentially should have no idea it happened until they check drag or notice the buff.

it rewards bad play to some extent
I figured out it was when we had vision of a dead enemy LOL thier dead bodies make the noise
I think if any enemy is outside of fog of war (living or dead) it makes the noise, and considering you tend to have people in a lane when your trying to sneak it, it's always given away.
